name: Apple Inc.
description: Apple Inc. is an American multinational corporation and technology company headquartered in Cupertino, California, in Silicon Valley. It is best known for its consumer electronics, software, and services.

name: nvidia
description: Nvidia is a software company which designs and supplies graphics processing units (GPUs), application programming interfaces (APIs) for data science and high-performance computing, and system on a chip units (SoCs) for mobile computing and the automotive market. It was Founded in 1993 by Jensen Huang (president and CEO), Chris Malachowsky, and Curtis Priem.

name: Procter & Gamble
description: Procter & Gamble is an American multinational consumer goods corporation that specializes in a wide range of personal health/consumer health, personal care and hygiene products; these products are organized into several segments including beauty; grooming; health care; fabric and home care; and baby, feminine, and family care.
